message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14000. I believe this is a fair price, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11500. I'm willing to make a deal, but I have to be careful with my budget.

Bob, I understand you're working with a budget. While $11500 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13000. This would still allow me to make a reasonable profit. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $13000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $12500. Let's see if we can make a deal.
